name: To verify the various screens present when Decline Transaction is performed

testSteps.description: And underwriter performs Decline transaction with Reason 'Unable to Compete' and Description 'Declined Quote'
And underwriter is on home page

Then below screens should be displayed and disabled
| Rating options |
| Policy retrospecting rating |
| Schedule rating |
| Inclusion Exclusion Details |
| Modeling Variables |
| Additional Information |
| Claim Information |
| Score Information |
| Other States Information |
| Waiver of subrogation |
| Additional Named Insured |
| Locations (1) |
| Workers comp |
| Named location linking |
| State information |
| Classifications |
| State retrospecting rating |
| Premium Summary |
| Producers (1) |
